data.title: Our Vision & Approach
data.text:
Unwavering Donor Stewardship

At NCF, we recognize the paramount importance of trust and transparency. Thatâ€™s why we provide independent, objective oversight, ensuring that the gifts entrusted to us are used exactly as intended by the charities you support. Your peace of mind is our utmost priority.

Preserving Your Charitable Legacy

Our unwavering allegiance is to you, the donor. We are genuinely passionate about your philanthropy. Our primary role is facilitating and safeguarding your charitable wishes, preserving your legacy for generations to come.

Focus On Impact, Not Profit

We concentrate on maximizing the impact of your donation by going beyond traditional grantmaking. We seek innovative solutions that maximize impact. By strategically allocating funds to deliver the most significant social benefit, we ensure that your generosity creates a real and meaningful difference in the lives of those who need it most.

We currently serve more than 150 donors, with funds ranging from a few thousand dollars to tens of millions.

Although most of our products are Donor-Advised Funds, we also offer Corporate Funds, Designated Funds, Scholarship Funds, and Fiscal Agencies, with a solution for every charitable client.
